block.p: KRAVITZ-Claire. On October 14, 2000. Beloved wife of Arthur. Devoted mother of Ellyn, Julie and the late Evan. Adored mother-inlaw of Robert Sheppard. Loving sister of Barry Wolkowitz. Cherished daughter of Lillian Wolkowitz. Services Monday, 1 PM, at ''Gutterman's, Inc,'' 175 Long Beach Rd, Rockville Centre, LI. Interment Wellwood Cemetery. In lieu of flowers donations to the Evan S. Kravitz Hebrew School at Temple Israel of South Merrick, Clubhouse Rd, Merrick, NY 11566.
